name: High Jump
requires: {OptAll(|Triple Jump| or |Back Flip| or |Side Flip| or (|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|))}

name: Momentum
requires: {OptAll(|Long Jump| or |Roll| or |Dive|)}

name: Cap Vault
requires: {OptAll(|Dive| and |Cap Jump|)}

name: Pyramid Skip
requires: {OptAll(|Bullet Bill| or (|Cap Vault| and (|Long Jump| or |Triple Jump|)))}

name: Into the Lake
requires: {OptAll((|Zipper| and |Swim|) or (|Dive| and |Cap Jump| and (|High Jump| or |Long Jump| or (|Triple Jump| and |Wall Jump|))) or (|Cap Jump| and |Triple Jump| and |Wall Jump| and |Goomba|))}

name: Above the Lake
requires: {OptAll(|Cheep Cheep| or |Swim| or (|Dive| and |Cap Jump|))}

name: Maze Skip
requires: {OptAll(|Uproot| or (|Dive| and |Cap Jump|))}

name: To the Wall
requires: {OptAll(|Hold/Throw| or (|High Jump| and |Dive| and |Cap Jump|) or (|Uproot| and |Dive|))}

name: Sherm Wall
requires: {OptAll(|To the Wall| and (|Sherm| or (|Goomba| and |Wall Jump| and |Dive|)))}

name: View of Lost
requires: {OptAll(|Ground Pound| and |Wall Jump|)}

name: After Gusty Barrier
requires: {OptAll(|Ty-foo| or (|Dive| and (|Long Jump| or |Triple Jump| or |Cap Jump|)))}

name: Get to Cheese
requires: {OptAll(|Lava Bubble| or (|Dive| and (|Triple Jump| or |Cap Jump| or (|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|))))}

name: Get to Meat
requires: {OptAll(|Volbonan| or ((|High Jump| or |Spin|) and (|Wall Jump| and |Dive|)) or (|High Jump| and (|Cap Jump| or (|Cap Jump| and |Dive|))))}

name: Enter the Courtyard
requires: {OptAll(|Pokio| or (|Dive| and (|Back Flip| or |Wall Jump| or (|Ground Pound Jump| and |Ground Pound|))))}

name: Over the Moat
requires: {OptAll(|Pokio| or (|High Jump| and |Dive| and |Cap Jump|) or ({YamlEnabled(easy_trick_jumps)} and |Dive| and |Cap Jump|))}

name: Parabones Skip
requires: {OptAll(|Parabones| or (|Dive| and |Cap Jump| and (|Long Jump| or |Triple Jump|)))}

name: Moon Cave Gauntlet
requires: {OptAll(|Parabones Skip| and |Banzai Bill| and |Spark Pylon|)}

name: Moon Cave Skip
requires: {YamlEnabled(moon_cave_skip)} and {OptAll(|Cap Jump| and |Wall Jump| and (|Back Flip| or (|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|)))}

name: Tourist 1
copy_location: A Tourist in the Metro Kingdom!

name: Tourist 2
copy_location: A Tourist in the Cascade Kingdom!

name: Tourist 3
copy_location: A Tourist in the Luncheon Kingdom!

name: Tourist 4
copy_location: A Tourist in the Moon Kingdom!

name: Tourist 5
copy_location: A Tourist in the Mushroom Kingdom!

name: Peach Moon
requires: |Peach Cap| and |Peach Cascade| and |Peach Sand| and |Peach Lake| and |Peach Wooded| and |Peach Cloud| and |Peach Lost| and |Peach Metro| and |Peach Snow| and |Peach Seaside| and |Peach Luncheon| and |Peach Ruined| and |Peach Bowser|

name: Peach Mushroom
requires: |Peach Moon|

name: Achievement
requires: |Unobtainium|

name: Test
requires: |Unobtainium|
